name: dev-time-tracker
description: Dev Time Tracker is an extension that helps developers track their productivity while coding. It tracks time spent on projects, provides insights into code quality, and offers health-related reminders to maintain a healthy work-life balance.

devtimetracker.apiUrl.description: Base URL of your tracking API

devtimetracker.pomodoro.workDuration.description: Duration of work sessions in minutes

devtimetracker.pomodoro.shortBreakDurati.description: Duration of short breaks in minutes

devtimetracker.pomodoro.longBreakDuratio.description: Duration of long breaks in minutes

devtimetracker.pomodoro.sessionsBeforeLo.description: Number of work sessions before a long break

devtimetracker.pomodoro.autoStartNextSes.description: Automatically start the next session/break when the current one ends

devtimetracker.metrics.enabled.description: Enable collection of code metrics and analytics

devtimetracker.metrics.syncInterval.description: Interval in seconds to sync metrics with the backend

devtimetracker.health.breakReminderInter.description: Interval in seconds between break reminders (0 to disable)

devtimetracker.health.postureReminderInt.description: Interval in seconds between posture check reminders (0 to disable)

devtimetracker.health.eyeStrainInterval.description: Interval in seconds between eye strain prevention reminders (0 to disable)

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
